title: 12/28/20 – HOUR 1 – Aaron Rodgers For MVP, PLUS Ed Bouchette
itunes:title: 12/28/20 – HOUR 1 – Aaron Rodgers For MVP, PLUS Ed Bouchette
description:
Doug Gottlieb and LaVar Arrington fill in for Dan Patrick and share their biggest takeaways from Week 16. The Chiefs and Packers seem to be on a collision course for the Super Bowl, although their effort levels might be trending in opposite directions. Plus, they speak with Ed Bouchette of The Athletic about the Steelers’ impressive comeback over the Colts on Sunday! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
